content.detailedDescription: We live under the eastern seaboard plane route. we always see planes at very high altitudes leaving trails as the fly past. this evening, while sitting in the back yard, a plane caught my eye because the sky was so clear. i noticed tha it was leaving a very short tail behind it, where as they usually linger for hours in the sky. i spotted an object that was following it and not leaving any trail like planes do at that high of an altitude. it was keeping pace and would move above, below and to the side of the plane but keeping a good distance behind. it moved above the planes trail and then made a sudden and steep arc like climb and vanished into thin air. gone!! there was not a cloud in the sky. the object was not reflecting light like the plane was. it seemed to be very opaque and very tear dropped in shape. seemd much shorter than the plane but much larger in diameter. it struck me as very strange because the object seemd to be following the plane as if tracking it.
content.summary: Watching object track a plane at very high altitude then vanish

content.detailedDescription:
[cms/tg/pid]

oakland ufo 6-11-2010
above 37 47��������� 30���������n 122 11��������� 19���������w
by kevinmc360
equipment nvrs 3x50 gen 2+ scope with sony hc52
time 10:00 pm
target  heading approximate 15 degrees north.
target(s) passes through constellations tbd, tbd past tbd.
target(s) travels tbd  degrees across sky in tbd seconds.
target(s) has no visible navigation lights.
target(s) makes no sound that can be heard by my observation.
observed what appears to be four individual targets in the infrared wave length.
did not observe target(s) in the visible light.
i was with my wife teresa for this event.
speed calculation based on tbd degrees of the night sky traveled in tbd seconds with 
differing altitudes for assumption. 
assume 500 meter speed = xx.Xkm/h (below cloud level)
assume 1km altitude speed = xx.Xkm/h
assume 5km altitude speed = xx.Xkm/h
assume 10km altitude speed = xx.Xkm/h
assume 20km altitude speed = xx.Xkm/h
assume 30km altitude speed = xx.Xkm/h
assume 192km altitude speed = xx.Xkm/h
i have to discount birds based on the speed and no honking and always arrive at the same time.
i have to discount conventional craft at 500 meters through 13000 meters due to navigation 
lights not being present or turned on while in the san francisco atc. big no no.
that leaves higher altitudes that need to be investigated further.
in summary we are possibly looking at 4 individual targets that are operating above no 
known normal conventional aircraft, altitudes and speed. they appear to be intelligently piloted 
because they hold a tight v formation with an un-natural ability to hold a straight course. the v
formation leads me to conclude that they are probably military in nature. they keep to a tight 
schedule flying over the above coordinates  at 10:00 pm every friday night.
at the end of the video the 4 targets climb together at what appears to
be an incredible rate of climb. i will do more investigation and try to better characterize speed and 
rates of climb using star charts for that night. more data will be available by next week.
thank you 
[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: 4 craft traveling in v formation heading 15 deg north

content.detailedDescription:
i was lying on the couch watching the weather channel. i was out playing hockey and i wanted to go back out. it looked as if the storm had passed on the radar, so i started to head back out. first, i glanced out the window when lightning caught my eye. i stood there and watched for a minute before i saw a black cigar shaped object hurtling through the sky. it was above the treeline, sliding at a 45 degree angle. at first, i dismissed the object as a bird, but there was a hawk flyng next to it. the hawk was shifting, but the ufo kept at a steady angle. the event lasted about 5 seconds. as soon as the sighting had occurred, i came up to my computer and wrote this report. so you can trust that the whole seen is fresh in my head and i didn't make up anything. remember, watch th skies.


  p.S. i am sorry there is no attached media. i know that lessens your belief in my testimony, but i swear, it was there!!!
content.summary: Black object; cigar shaped;streaked through tree line at steady 45 degree angle

content.detailedDescription:
Los objetos tenian una forma esferica metalica brillante 



me en encontraba en el patio de mi casa el cielo se encontraba despejado y de casualidad me dio por observar, vi un objeto brillante pense que era algun tipo de estrealla pero me di cuenta que el objeto se encontrava en movimiento, me asombre y llame a mi padre quien se encontrava viendo tv y le dije padre mire lo que hay en el firmamento y el me dijio que raro al observar como por uno o dos minutos de tras de este objeto se encontravan 5 mas que se dirigian en una misma direccion pero lento, llame al resto de la familia para asi dejar constancia delo visto y ocurrido mi madre, hermanos y tios salieron a observar y quedaron perplejos ps estos se detubieron por unos segundos al comenzar de nuevo el movimiento los 6 objetos pasaron por una peque���a nube y desaparecieron esta nube era muy peque���a. y se encontraba sola el resto de espacio en el cielo era despejado. 

nose si sea normal pero quede perplejo al observar este onbjeno no me podia mover no es la primera vez que observo objetos en movimiento solo que prefiero callar para que las personas y mi familia me consideren loco.
content.summary: Esferas metalicas

content.detailedDescription:
At 11:00 am my daughter and i decided to eat at the china buffet by walmart (near eastgate mall rt 32). upon entering the parking lot i noticed a round object hovering in the distance. it seemed odd because it was about the same hight as the lightposts in the parking lot but the lights on them were all square. i pointed out the object to my daughter and asked if she could tell what it was.I parked the truck and we got out and continued to observe it.
it was pretty windy that day coming out of the norwest to the south east. the path of the object was in a northern direction. it was below the clouds and the wind didnt seem to have an affect on its speed or direction. the sphere was a fairly large object but moving rather slowly. there were no contrails from a jet and it was too large to have been a prop type plane. 
at times it seem to get very light in color till you almost couldnt make it out then it would become darker and more visible.We continued watching it until it was out of view from where we were. i called the clermont county airport and sheriffs dept to see if anyone else had spotted this. niether of them had recieved other reports.I asked the person with whom i spoke at the airport if it could have been a possible hot air balloon..He said it would be unlikely for the wind conditions..I didnt notice a gondola on the sphere anyway. he said it could have been a large plane. i didnt see any wings, fuselage etc. i didnt have a camera with me just my cell phone so no picture was taken.
content.summary: Witnessed an orb or sphere shaped object hovering below the clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house, we were outside in the backyard drinking a beer and having a smoke when i looked up and noticed a light in the sky to the south , that at first, (at least to me) looked like the space station flying over......... i said out loud "ooh sweet the space station is flying right over us!".... everyone looked up and saw the same object... then the object seemed to get a bit brighter..... the object stayed on the same heading for about 3 seconds. then without slowing down it did a right angle 90 degree turn then sped off, out of sight(about 25 seconds) to the east.
content.summary: Object appeared from south did 90 degree turn.Then left to the east

content.detailedDescription:
I was having a bonfire with my girlfriend when she pointed on the ball of light. 
it was fast, passing by us in about a minute. coming from the west and heading east. it was also pretty low to the ground, approximately 500-1000 ft. high. it was completely silent, both my girlfriend and i could not make out a sound. i couldn't make the shape of the object out because it was extremely bright. it seemed to be a white light without any flashing. that's what i orginally thought was odd, but the lack of any sound is far stranger. since most of the planes and helicopters i do see pass by are very loud. 
it moved in a straight line and i lost sight of it once it passed behind some trees. 

at first i thought it was a helicopter because a medical helicopter passed going in the same direction an hour earlier. though i recall how loud the helicopter was. 

then i thought maybe it was a blimp because its race weekend. but it was moving much too fast for any blimp i've ever seen.
content.summary: Fast moving, low altitude, silent ball of white light flying from west to east.

content.detailedDescription: It was on my last day of going to treatment at stcloud hospital my neighbor gave me a ride to stcloud hospital and back to my trailer in walkins mn .He parked his car he went staight into his trailer .I went to mine .I opened my trailer door to tell my wife i was home .She didnt wake up so i turned around and went out side the door was still open i than was standing on the deck by the door i was facing the other nighbers trailer.I dug in my pocket to get a smoke looking straight ahead put the cig in my mouth was going to light it.Then this big huge charchel black space craft came over half a telephone pull up coming straight over .This is what i seen.Two men sitting in bucket seats behind them two women standing up they had jumper suits on the meterial was normal but somthing i have never seen on earth difrent fabrick.There were two big square computers they had crystal like thousand of blinking lights in front of the ladys one lady to the right other lady to the left elevater in the middle.They had a emblem on there.Suite the space chip was awsome somthing that came right out of the show room crystal clean it had no weld marks at all there is more i need a scetcher to give exact details of the reast of it.It had no noise or sound .They look to be a little biger than us.I wish they would of took me .
content.summary: Its charcal black huge two men to women inside of it .

content.detailedDescription: Prior to the event,the sighting..My sister had men in black experience at the house we had just shifted from.I went out alone at night and walked into the woods past a football ground on many nights as a child.I know i was going to the lights but to this day can not remember those nights.Only coming back home would i relise id been somewhere.When it happenned to my sis i knew they were real.About yr later we shifted to an old farm house in an area i now know called'the haunted hills.Where many ufos have been seen over the yrs.I was 9 yrs old when the most memorble ufo was hovering in a paddock out the back of the house we rented,half a mile away.It had just gone dark half hour before.Me n older brother were out the back yard when we noticed it.I said to him'whats that machine over there?A new harvesting machine?That was my first thought.My brother said'its way rtoo big.Then we noticed it was what appeared to be gliding from one end of the paddock to the other end .Like it was scanning the field.Little colored lights were shining on the tall grass .It sort of zig zagged as it moved towards us.Thats when i noticed it had no wheels and it was hovering.It stopped a few times spinning around slowly.It seemed to just come over to us in no time,it hovered about 50-60 metres away from us,but only just hovering above the tall grass..Say 6 to 10 foot from ground.We were at the paddock fence,holding onto ithe wire.My brother totolly freaked out and ran away screaming into the house for mom n dad.I was confused at his reation as i was ammazed by what i was seeing.I just stayd there mesmorised.It hoved near me and spun slowly around,blueish green lights on top but a reddish light underneath.At the corners of the disc shape where big giant windows.They had spokes that instantly reminded me of the peace sign or mercedes benze tail lights had a simalar spoke pattern.I could see wat seemed to be a person moving at one red,orange window.I felt i recognised it before and i guess thats why i had no fear of it.As my whole family ran out to see what was goin on the ufo flew off over the fence tops of the paddock and straight over tree tops.My parents got to see it zipping over the trees leaving a orange glow ass it faded over horizon of trees.Hated my chick brother for givin them up that night.They might have takin me away if not for him freaking out.My sister started drawing eyes in the centre of ppls foreheads.She was only 8 yrs old.Anyway ive seen many sightings since but that was a very close up encounter that still bothers me today.I know they r pychicly connected to some of us.Thats why in the past i never had a problem finding them.I think ive met the bad ones but know there r good aliens too.Demons n angels maybe.After the event i described b4,my parents told us not to talk to anyone at school about it.As it had happenned to mom n dad too.And back in the 60s theyd call ya nuts.But knew others it happenned to to as a kid.Ill talk about my last sightings one day.Thought ill start at the beginning
content.features: Dome,  Window(s),  Patterned Surface,  Appendage(s),  Other
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was circular but domed top and bottom, lights all over, 4 big lights on each end, orange-reddish, hovering 3 to 4 meters off ground.

content.detailedDescription: Well i get off work at 11:00 p.M. and tend to look at the stars and other celestial bodies, as i am a amateur astronomer and know my way around the sky a bit. i have seen many strange objects here in oregon in our crystal clear night sky, tonight was a bit stranger than usual. it was 11:10 and i was on the north side of hwy 97 facing the road coming out of my work just south of bend, or. i took a look up at the stars and saw what i thought to be a satellite or the i.S.S. however it could not be the space station due to the fact that it travels east to west... and this was a blueish colored object that was almost directly south and moving towards the east. also it could not be a satellite since it instantaneously stopped and began to move west, and started to perform perfect counter clock-wise circles. after that it began to zig-zag in various directions and more circles which felt to me to be almost as if it were dancing in a way. it broke all the basic laws our aircraft are based upon, and looked as if it were just outside the atmosphere. i watched this "dance" for about 10-15 minutes and would have continued to until a local sheriff came by and asked if i needed help. i left and pulled off on the next highway exit and got out to see it was still there, i tried to get home and get my binoculars but it had gone when i got back to my place. i felt it was there for me to see, that is the only way i can describe it.
content.summary: Blueish star-like object seen south of bend performing counter-clockwise circles and zig-zagging

content.detailedDescription:
I was debating on setting up one of my telescopes for a little astro-photography session. while looking towards antares in scorpius to judge the seeing conditions i saw what at first appeared to be an airplane. i am within a mile or two of the local airport so i see planes all the time.

what caught my attention was the red flash you usually see on the planes tail. once i glanced over to it i saw a blue glow all around it with a red light in the middle. it really looked like a gas burner you see on stoves flipped over and flying through the air. the blue glow part of it however seemed more like it was contained somehow in a very uniformed pattern and the middle was more an orange color that flashed red on occasion.

the blue was really attractive and reminded me of the blue sparks you see from high voltage power line's when they bump each other and cause a spark.
the red light in the middle flashed once more and the whole object was gone. 

it appeared to be very close to the flight path from the airport and was heading in a northerly direction. it was over a nice bunch of trees before it vanished and did not seem to be more than 500 - 1000 feet off the ground. 


it made no noise whatsoever and i stood still for a few minutes afterwords trying to rationalize what i just saw. before coming in a real plane happened to fly over so i was able to rule it out as being plane but it also assisted me in estimating its size. i would say it was about 4 times the size of the single engine small planes that fly from the airport, both in length and width.  most of the planes are cessna's but there are a couple of gulf-streams jets that fly from there too and it would have been about twice the size of the gulf stream. i drew a picture as soon as i came in and attached it in hopes someone has seen something similar.
content.summary: Blue flames like triangle shaped object  disappeared in thin air

content.detailedDescription: Tonight i was driving home with some friends after a birthday party. it was 11:00pm and i was on oakland blvd entering i-95 heading southbound towards miami. after a minute of driving on i-95 i noticed a blue orb fly across the sky heading south west. the blue orb was only visible for about 3 seconds when i noticed it as it came into my field of vision and then dissapeared instantly without an afterglow or anything like that. it was almost like a shooting star but it wasn't. the orb maintained a consistent sphere shaped while flying. it never blinked or flashed like the lights from airplanes or helicopters. it didn't have a tail or streak like a shooting star would have. my girlfriend also noticed it. she was sitting next to me. out of 5 people in the car only both of us saw it because it was only visible throught the windsheild. we both looked at each other said "what the hell was that?" i thought it was weird. i am pretty sure others that were driving next to me saw it as well because the blue orb was flying pretty low.
content.summary: Blue orb

content.detailedDescription: I woke up around 4-430 in the morning and went outsidew on my patio to have a cigarete. i was walking around and happened to look up and i noticed a triangle shaped object with lights on each point in the air. i couldn't believe the way it was moveing! it was moveing north to south and it would just cut across the sky moveing left to right without makeing any kind of turn. this went on for about 4-6 minutes and then it flew off.
content.summary: A triangle object with lights on each point.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in my back yard with my dog. i was looking up at my black walnut tree when i saw a very bright light to my left. my first thought was that it was a firework except that it was far away and large. it moving to the northeast at a very high rate of speed.
i've seen shooting stars before but, this was bigger and seemed much closer.
content.summary: I saw what looked like a bright roman candle fireball move quickly to the northeast

content.detailedDescription: When i was about 7or8,my mom was washing dishes from dinner. when she yelled " what is that", and ran out of the house. we all got up and ran out behind her, when we got outside we all saw what she was yelling about.It was a disc shaped craft, floating above our barn. i remember thinking i could hit it with a rock! the craft was so low, maybe 20 feet above our barn. my whole family was just standing there,watching it. there was no sound coming from it at all. then it started slowly moving over our house. i remember my mom saying "i am calling the police".She barely got the words out of her mouth when the craft started moving passed our house and in seconds it was gone. the craft it was round and white, with 4 lights on the bottom. after it was gone i dont remember anyone saying anything about what we just saw. just lately i have brought it up to my family and they remember it just like me. so as a young girl i knew that we are not alone.The encounter lasted about 15or20 min.
content.summary: Saw a ufo over my barn!

content.detailedDescription:
Standing outside taking puppy out and pulsating light above caught my attention. at first i thought it was just an airplane but as i watched it there were no wings and no other lights as planes have and it was way too low to be a plane, and the light made it clear that it was a perfect sphere. then i thought maybe helicopter but my husband came out and said it couldn't be, there was no sound and the light was not anything explainable.The pulsing was a very intese white light then to nothing. it continued moving south west very slow and the pulsing was continuous. i noticed a smaller light hovering underneath that didn't appear to be attached. at a certain point it slowly traveled more to the left, and change in path too hard for a plane to do, over the tree line at a field behind my house. then it moved even more over to the left and seemed to hover in that area for a few moments and then it was gone. we were constantly moving to maintain a clear view and there is no way this was explainable. the light underneath never moved,it was with the object the whole time. sadly my phone was in the house and i didn't want to take my eyes off it, not sure if i should beleive what i was seeing. 

there was lightening in the distance. and i could see stars although in our area there were some clouds. we did confirm the diffenece with several airplanes that passed at different times and there was a total difference. where we are located we can see the shapes and lights of planes easily, and there is always sound, with this there wasn't and it moved in odd ways and disappeared without decending.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large pulsating white sphere

content.detailedDescription:
Originally reported to ufos northwest:

i also witnessed something similar while driving on i-5 from portland to eugene! i looked out to the coast range to the west, and very far off in the distance over the range a bright row of white lights appeared to turn on in the sky. the row must have been quite large and there appeared to be some kind of energy waving between them. they were much like arc lights. i believe that what i was seeing was some kind of platform seen in perspective with the lights underneath. they were visible for about 20 seconds and then they appeared to turn in the sky and then turn off. i was very surprised. i continued on i-5, and about 30 seconds later as i was looking toward eugene i saw them reappear in the sky toward the south, with exactly the same appearance. then they appeared to turn direction and slowly turned off!
content.summary: Large line of lights/orbs moving together.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my front yard and i saw it come from behind the trees, it crossed over my street and made kind of a loop and went over my house it was very low i did get a picture of it. i know it was not a star. after it passed over my house it floated out my view point, i was puzzled, amazed and i really don't feel like myself anymore. i know for a fact that we are not alone. there is something out there.
content.summary: Very bright top looked  flat bottom shaped like a heart.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a break from work and standing under a covered viaduct facing 5th st. (east) in downtown louisville, ky at 10:10 am june 10, 2010.  i looked up in the sky (east) and saw a brilliant white sphere/orb in the sky.  the location was b/w 2 downtown towers (pnc tower and aegon tower).  i noticed the object b/c it shown against a very blue sky, in b/w 2 airplane contrails.  at first i thought it was a light refraction off of a plane or a light shining off a mirror.  the object moved side ways left to right, then up and down, almost as if it was floating in the sky.  the color of the orb never changed, bright white.  the object "hovered" for approx. 15 seconds, then shot off to the east at a fast pace.  upon seeing the object, i wanted to grab a witness and ask them to verify.  i felt that what i saw was indeed under its own control or intelligently controlled.  at best i can estimate the height at 10 - 15,000 ft.  it was a clear day, no clouds in the sky minus the contrails.  this made viewing the object very easy.  during the viewing i mostly felt curious, even waving my arm to the object to come closer.  

i came outside on june 11 at the same time to see if i could see the object again.  it did not reappear.
content.summary: Bright sphere moves under its own power

content.detailedDescription:
my family and i were visiting some friends in north phoenix for the memorial day weekend. it was about 90 degrees, crystal clear with a very slight breeze. we were all in the pool when i saw a large very bright sphere floating over the top of lookout mountain moving east. it was approximately 500' above the top of the mountain puting it at about 1500' above us. 
  i jokingly pointed and said "ufo". everyone laughed and we tried to think of anything else it could be. a silver mylar balloon, too big. a hot air balloon, no basket, too shiny. definately not a plane or helicopter. we settled on a bunch of silver mylar balloons tied together.
  my issue was that it was too big to be balloons. it moved very smoothly and was completely unaffeced by wind. it traveled in a perfectly straight line and did not appear to gain altitude as a balloon would. it didn't appear to have any lights but reflected the sun like a mirror. 
  given the location of the home we were at, the object was visible for 15 to 20 minutes. it traveled east north east. we could see the object reflecting sun light when the object had to be 20 miles away. we could see it travel over the tonto national forest mountain range (love google maps). no way any number of mylar balloons would be visible at that distance. we ultimately lost sight of it when it dipped below the horizon.
content.summary: Highly reflective sphere approx 20' to 30' in diameter.

content.detailedDescription: Hi, i have reported seeing ufos in the past under a former name [cms/tg/pid], ive had numerous experiences in the last 20 years. this morning on 06/11/2010, i left my home early to go to work and my way  return a product i purchased from the apple store on 59 street they are open 24 hours, i while i left my house about 4:05 am, the train station stop is burhe ave stations elevated. i walked towards the front platform as i always take the first car. i hung my book bag on the railing so i can hook my house keys in my back pack, and then i just looked up into the early evening sky and there it was, at first i thought it was a bright star, it was very bright, almost white, but it was moving very slowly. i thought it might be a helicopter, yet they fly very low in my area due to traffic reporting as i live by the hutch. but this object looked like a moving star it flew over the buildings towards the park, in a moment it kind of, or it appeared as though it was wiggling making moves that threw my balance off. yet there were no other lights to it, no red, blue, just white star looking floating through the aor object, as it was making its way the park, a helicopter was coming underneath its path, the object appeared to be really way high above as it fly over the helicopter. i was amazed because i was able to compare and contrast both flying one over the other, and there was no doubt it was a slow moving star like bright light object. when it king of wiggled i said its no way, ive never seen a plane, or any thing wiggled like that it caught me off guard as i said before my equilibriam was thrown off, and also i felt so connected to self and the object like i wasnt afraid, yet i just knew it was a ufo, and i felt a strange feeling this object was flown with intelligence. i kept going towards the park, the sun was just king peeking through in the horizon very little ligt, it slowly flew straight toward into the early morning light.....That was it.
content.summary: Standing and waiting for the train star like object slowly flying over towards the park, flew over helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright white light in the sky. it moved slowly. i knew it was not a plane. after i called my family outside to see it,with a pair of binoculars,  we all agreed it was cigar shaped with white lights around the perimeter, and green lights on top. it moved in the far distance very slowly, until it disappeared from our sight behind some trees.
content.summary: Cigar shape with white lights around the entire perimeter and green lights on top

content.detailedDescription:
The 6 june 2010, france and canada were trying to make official open contact with our extraterrestrial visitors.

in t���opolis, aix-en-provence, france while the coordinator of this civil initiave was speaking a bright flash appeared in the sky.

meanwhile in canada, at 22h00 it was rainy, after the sunset it was a grey sky and clouds.  a bright blue light appeared behind the clouds it was very beautifull to watch such a blue light with all those grey clouds and rain.

after the event, i watched all over the internet to find if others spacecrafts appear in other places around the world (6 june 2010).

in london, 3 white orbs in triangular formation was filmed
in rome, the same triangular formation was also seen and filmed by some military.  the video was broadcast in a italian television station.

i can't say if there's a link between the the world extraterrestrial contact movement and those sightings, but i wanted to share with you.

ufo ovni triangle frmation london uk 6th june 2010 
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=3tkra_jlzao&translated=1

ufo su roma: filmato dei militari - 6/06/2010 
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=ztitrmqgupo&translated=1

world extraterrestrial contact
http://www.Antollma.Com/

ps: next worldwide meeting... 6 june 2011, we are looking for others ambassador of their own country to make official contact with extraterrestrials.... is there any leaders in the room?
content.summary: 3 white orbs triangle formation (london and rome) world extraterrestrial contact

content.detailedDescription: I'm a realtor. during a showing of a condo with a fabulous view, i snapped a few pictures with my blackberry. i'm a licensed pilot and having learned at toronto city centre airport i can guarantee that there were no aircraft coming in for landing at the time of this image. i realized today that there is a white orb in the image appearing just east of the airport in the top left-ish area of the image ! i did not notice this at the time the image was taken.
content.summary: Unexplained light east of toronto city centre airport

content.detailedDescription:
Caminaba llegando a la casa por una avenida en una zona industrial donde hay unas paredes de entre 3 o 4m, de un lado, a eso de las 7 u 8 de la noche, ya casi al oscurecer y vi a lo lejos unas luces bastante fuerte que me llamaron la atenci���n, me detuve y las estuve observando por unos 2 o 3 minutos, hasta que llegaron sobre mi cabeza, a una altura que me parec���a, a la que volar���a una avioneta o al doble de un helic���ptero, vi perfectamente las 5 luces, 2 ten���an forma de la figura del penta estar de la crysler con unas l���neas delgadas y todo el conjunto del pent���gono parec���a ventana y de las cuales sal���a luz, estaban en forma vertical una a un lado de la otra, y por delante en medio hab���a otras 2 luces una antes que la otra y luego otras dos casi juntas y luego otra mas adelante, todas estas ultimas luces eran redondas y parec���an de posicionamiento o focos "normales", el objeto era "invisible" solo vi las luces y no pude ver ninguna figura met���lica como nave, de hecho al estar encima de mi, casi pude ver a trav���s de las luces, pero no hab���a muchas estrellas a esa hora, 7 u 8 pm, se mov���a como a uno 100 o 150 km. por hora, me dio la impresi���n de ser una nave de observaci���n, sigui��� caminando y se me perdi��� cuando paso a trav���s de las altas paredes de los terrenos de una fabrica,  es una zona solitaria y no hab���a nadie mas caminando, otra cosa que me llamo la atenci���n fue que no hacia ning���n ruido, eso fue como en el a���o 2003 o 4, aunque en la avenida habia una rgular circulacion, nadie noto nada.

gracias por la atencion a la presente
content.summary: Unas luces volando 2 en forma de la figura de la crysler en forma vertical y 5 delante

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling in a car heading north onto the ramp of i-75/85 north from peachtree road. i was sitting in the passenger seat of the car and noticed lights in the sky. that caught my attention. i looked above and saw a circular metal dome shaped craft with 8 -10 bright lights beneath it. it was about 8:45 p.M and not dark yet so it was clearly visable. the only problem was that we were traveling at about 60 mph and could not pull over on such a busy highway onramp to re-look at it. i noticed it was odd because it was not attached to any poles or towers. i thought at  first maybe they were lights from a tower, however when i focused on it again, i clearly saw that it was not. the object seemed to be about 200 feet in the air to the right (from my perspective), of a 4 -5 story building. it was not very far up in the air, i thought maybe it was a blimp at first but once i focused on the object i saw the lights pulsating in a little and back out. it was just hovering not moving at all.  it was very clear and because we could not stop the car, it was lost from my field of vision. we drove back about an hour later and it was gone. unfortunately i didnt go through my purse to get my phone-camera and take a picture because i didnt think about it at that exact moment, and i didnt want to take my eyes off of it. especially because i was trying to point it out to my friend driving the car, but he couldnt see out of my window that far up, and drive safely at the same time.
content.summary: Circular object with 8-10 lights beneath it hovering in one spot near busy intersections in atlanta , ga.

content.detailedDescription:
Location:  maricopa, az.
date:  24 may 10 
time:  around 9 pm
skies:  clear

well, thanks to this site i think it���s time for me to report my sighting also. knowing that others have seen basically the same objects that i observed on the night of 24 may is going to make this interesting. 
i departed my house in route to phoenix for some last minute shopping at jc pennies, before my trip to germany.  i turned right on to 347 (john wayne pkwy/maricopa rd) south from alterra pkwy. got into left lane due to upcoming u-turn at w. juan st./347 intersection. as soon as i turned on to 347 i noticed what i first thought be three landing lights of a larger low flying aircraft in a left bank about to land. the lights were just off to the right of 347 and appeared to be over the ak chin casino. then i thought to myself, hey there���s no airport in maricopa and this aircraft is way too low to land at phoenix airport. the lights looked to be about 500 ft or so above the casino.  then i had that,���wtf is that?��� moment and tried to figure out what i was looking at. the three lights (orbs) were in a straight line, evenly spaced, very large in size, and amber in color with a very slight shimmer or heat wave look.  there was no glare or beam of light as associated with normal lights. i think a lager passenger jet at the same altitude and distance, would be completely covered / blanketed out by the size of one orb. the size and span of all three orbs covered an area much larger than the casino property and appeared to hover over the casino with no sound.  when i was about 1000 ft. or so from the intersection and thinking about pulling over for a better look, the two orbs on the left disappeared. the remaining orb now appeared to have a cat eye or vertical oblong shape and stay visible for a second or two longer. once i reached the intersection, i waited on one or two passing cars and watched the third orb disappeared. i made the u turn, stopped in the breakdown lane, and waited for a while to see if the orbs would reappear. being that they did not reappear after a couple of minutes, i headed to phoenix and keeping a lookout for the orbs. i had no other sighting.

so what did i see?  being that i���m an aviation buff, i pretty sure it wasn���t an aircraft or not an aircraft that i know of.  i sure it wasn���t a type of flare (hand, motor, artillery launched or aircraft dropped).  i���m not sure if the orbs were part of one object or three individual orbs. to me they looked to be part of one object but there was no visible silhouette or superstructure, so i can���t really say that it was. but if the orbs were part of one object, then that thing would have been huge. if they were individual objects, then each looked to have been larger than a larger passenger jet. so do i think i saw a ufo? my answer, in one word would be, ���yes���. would i like to see another one? same answer.
content.summary: Three  circlar objects / orbs, amber in color

content.detailedDescription: It was just after 12 midnight and i was laying in bed with my girlfriend, who was already asleep, as i was just about to go to sleep, i was incredibly startled by a defining vibration/rumbeling in the sky directly over the house. by the time i was able to get out of bed and to the open window, it had professed to making the sound of some sort of winding and whirling, sounded like as if i was standing on the runway when a double decker jet was taking off, it got faster sounding by the second, when i got to the window, all i could see was the area in front of my house slightly lit up, and was only able to hear the object ascending directly up into the sky as if it was moving at 1000s of miles per hour. my brother and his girlfriend were able to hear the object as well, but were both in 2 seprate rooms with no access to windows facing the direction of object. when we went outside to investigate, we had noticed that the tree branches closest to the ground were literaly pushed down anywhere from 3 to 10 feet each, some of them touching the roof of my brothers car. we called the local police and no had reported anything. i would have liked to believe this was an airplane or helicopter at least, but the way it didn't make a sound coming in, and sounded stationary and no more than 75 ft away as it "turned on" and ascended made me realize it couldn't have been, that as well as the bent branches. i was extremley disturbed at how incredibly close to the house it was, and was frustrated i couldn't get up sooner to cacth a better look.
content.summary: Ufo comes without making a sound, and leaves waking up whole house

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside for a smoke and looking directly up above me since the constelation of drago is supposed to be directly above my head according to star maps of june, i seen this dimly lit object which might be a communication satellite or some such man made object traveling from the south to the north parallel and on the right side of the handle of the little dipper?  i am guessing it is the little dipper because the pan of the dipper faces the north star.  after the object past the handle of the little dipper it quickly faded from eyesight.

i have never seen a satellite in this flight path before but i have to consider the possibility of it being a man made satellite and i don't know what path they take across the sky.

no pictures or film was taken.
content.summary: Very dim object possible communication satellite

content.detailedDescription: As a child in ft. knox, ky, rather i was in 4th and 5th grade, i woke in the early morning hrs in my bunkbed. for some reason. then i had the inclanation to go to the window that looked out back behind the army housing. as i stood there at the window i saw a disc shape object, quiet, land in the field behind our army housing. next thing i knew i was waking up in the morning. at breakfast, i remember telling my mom and my sisters and brother about it and was very anxious to finish breakfast and go check it out, the area i saw it. my mother said, "not till after breakfast". i went out and ran to the spot where other kids were looking at the ground where a round "dead grass" circle was. i said,"thats where something landed last night and they all started laughing at me. i dismissed all this. we moved back to sc and in later yrs had ufo sightings. right off an army base where we lived. skip to adulthood in the navy, 79-85. 22-28 yrs old. married, 24-25 yrs old and my exwife had found a "bb" like object in my lower right leg. in my shin just above my ankle. there were times and instances of lost time that to this day, i cannot account for. i had gotten out of the navy and had a bread route in charleston, sc, living in summerville when she found it, the bb. you could role it around in my leg but it would not leave that spot it was in. skip another 10 or so years. florida, divorced, living in swfl, 1990. in the navy reserves, st. pete., desert storm duty in mayport, fl. had weird experiences with dreams, waking up with cold liquid running down my throat. odd.. move to 2007, auto accident that almost kills me. in the hospital for 45 days. released, recovering since. had quite a bit of damage but am managing okay. i noticed that the "bb" in my leg is gone. just feels like a scoop mark where it was and now have one behind my right earlobe. i plan on having it removed and biopsy conducted. i'm putting this out in responce to nc female who has had this going on since she was five. you are not alone and, neither are we all, here on earth. god bless. j
content.summary: Landing
